医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
维生素 D 缺乏与脓毒症死亡率之间是否存在关联？血清维生素 D 水平不足对脓毒症预后的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Is-there-an-association- Between-vitamin-D-deficiency-and-sepsis-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Is-there-an-association- Between-vitamin-D-deficiency-and-sepsis-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ccb6848-3712-4821-9d24-f13c53627f16 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 05:39:00 -0400 Is there an association between vitamin D deficiency and sepsis mortality?
医疗保健环境和MPOX传播：了解风险因素猴痘（Mpox）病毒在各种环境和体液中的稳定性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Healthcare-settings-and-mpox-transmission-Understanding-the-risk-factors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Healthcare-settings-and-mpox-transmission-Understanding-the-risk-factors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=642ef878-ba3a-4d53-900c-7f9782e23f2a Thu, 12 Oct 2023 05:11:00 -0400 Healthcare settings and mpox transmission: Understanding the risk factors
咖啡因消耗对脂肪氧化的影响咖啡因消耗与脂肪氧化之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Impact-of-caffeine-conspiration-on-oxidation-of-fats.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Impact-of-caffeine-conspiration-on-氧化-of-fats.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34ea13a2-9582-4ad4-8935-1cee81b7f2c3 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 04:32:00 -0400 Impact of caffeine consumption on oxidation of fats
释放希望：艾滋病患者认知障碍的治疗方法即将出现研究人员研究了艾滋病毒患者神经认知障碍风险增加的机制，并探索了潜在的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Unlocking-hope-Promising-treatments-for-cognitive-impairment-in-HIV-病人-on-the-horizo​​n.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Unlocking-hope-Promising-treatments-for-cognitive-impairment-in-HIV-病人-on-the-horizo​​n.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efb750e6-27c7-42b2-bb70-ced477a5eec6 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 02:49:00 -0400 Unlocking hope: Promising treatments for cognitive impairment in HIV patients on the horizon
种族和潜在可改变的危险因素对痴呆症的影响潜在可改变的风险因素对痴呆症的影响因南亚人、黑人和白人而异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Ethnicity-and-the-effect-of-潜在-可修改-风险因素-on-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Ethnicity-and-the-effect-of-潜在-可修改-风险因素-on-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0ed6e84-0b1c-4bf9-929c-76b9ec560eb1 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 02:44:00 -0400 Ethnicity and the effect of potentially modifiable risk factors on dementia
BioLizard 推出新的 BioVerse 平台以加速生命科学研发流程BioLizard 是一家生物信息学、数据分析和数据管理服务及咨询公司，引领生命科学行业的数字化转型，今天宣布推出新的 BioVerse 平台。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/BioLizard-launches-new-BioVerse-Platform-to-accelerate-life-sciences-RD-processes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/BioLizard-launches-new-BioVerse-Platform-to-accelerate-life-sciences-RD-processes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=678797f2-17c8-4cff-8aaf-5e622be767df Thu, 12 Oct 2023 01:39:00 -0400 BioLizard launches new BioVerse Platform to accelerate life sciences R&D processes
雷诺现象的遗传原因已确定伦敦玛丽女王大学精准医疗研究所 (PHURI) 和柏林夏里特医学大学柏林健康研究所 (BIH) 的研究人员已经确定了雷诺现象的遗传原因。他们的研究结果今天（10 月 12 日）发表在《自然通讯》上，可能会为雷诺氏症患者带来第一个有效的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Genetic-causes-of-Raynaude28099s-phenomenon-identified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Genetic-causes-of-Raynaude28099s-phenomenon-identified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15645ca1-41c2-4323-8063-c8afcc4dc603 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 01:37:00 -0400 Genetic causes of Raynaud’s phenomenon identified
莉莉警告说，老年人和弱势群体面临家庭低温的威胁SaaS 公司 Lilli 表示，去年冬天一些家庭的气温低至 5 摄氏度，需要紧急采取干预措施，防止老年人和弱势群体的健康面临风险。Lilli 是一家使用主动护理生活方式监测技术来彻底改变护理方式的 SaaS 公司。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Elderly-and-vulnerable-people-at-risk-from-low-home-temporals-warns-Lilli.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Elderly-and-vulnerable-people-at-risk-from-low-home-temporals-warns-Lilli.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7defdc1-6985-46dd-8ca0-a8381a8308fe Thu, 12 Oct 2023 01:33:00 -0400 Elderly and vulnerable people at risk from low home temperatures, warns Lilli
智能手术刀可以为机器人设备进行的手术铺平道路一项研究表明，带有内置传感器的手术刀可以简化外科医生的培训，并为机器人设备执行的手术铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Smart-scalpels-could-pave-the-way-for-surgeries-performed-by-robotic-devices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Smart-scalpels-could-pave-the-way-for-surgeries-performed-by-robotic-devices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=526b23cb-5178-4eaa-a7a1-79f66b2968ef Thu, 12 Oct 2023 01:31:00 -0400 Smart scalpels could pave the way for surgeries performed by robotic devices
OrganaBio 成立新部门，以满足对分散临床试验支持不断增长的需求OrganaBio 是专门从事细胞和免疫疗法开发解决方案的合同技术开发和制造组织 (CTDMO)，今天宣布正式推出细胞加工和冷冻保存 (CPC) 服务，这是 OrganaBio 的一个新部门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/OrganaBio-launches-new-division-to-meet-having-demand-for-decentralized-clinical-trial-support.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/OrganaBio-launches-new-division-to-meet-having-demand-for-decentralized-clinical-trial-support.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=709535ca-460f-4cb7-a722-59859e32d887 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 01:28:00 -0400 OrganaBio launches new division to meet growing demand for decentralized clinical trial support
